attributes.action: invite an investigation by the Serious Fraud Office into the particulars of MP's, their expenses, and the possibility of the commission of offences under S.2, 3, and 4, of the Fraud Act 2006.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The investigation team should also include qualified investigators NOT affiliated with the Serious Fraud Office, in order to maintain genuine impartiality (especially in light of the SFO being pressured to drop the case against BAE). After all, if the MP's have done nothing wrong, they have nothing to hide.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
